name: Son of Perun Kharkiv
description:
2054. After the war, Kharkiv has changed its external accounting and become the "Ukrainian Detroit". You play as its resident, veteran Andriy Bondarenko, a detective in the Kharkiv Police Department, which is owned by a private corporation. Your task is to find the person responsible for the failure of the corporation's security systems.
What awaits you:
- A story that is a spin-off to "CosmoOdyssey" and has unexpected plot twists;
- A detective story in which you will be the main character;
- Kharkiv of the year 2054;
- 9 different locations in the city;
- The colorful atmosphere of the Slobozhanska capital;
- Original soundtrack by a Kharkiv rock band;
- Deep Lore.
You will play as a war veteran Andrey Bondarenko. He gained superpowers as a side effect of a recovery program and is a special agent for a large corporation. So your task is not only to find out who is responsible for the events, but also to find out his true motive. Along the way, you will have many enemies that you will deal with thanks to the power gained through the mistake.
